name: Space Clicker Tycoon
description:
Space Clicker Tycoon is a game that is currently still in development. You can test it and give feed back here. There will most likely be bugs and issues, because the game has a ways to go. 

Right now, only Survival Mode is working. To play, click the green box in the center to earn cash. You will need to buy a certain amount of defense points before each wave ends. (There is no death screen event yet.)

To play, extract the folder inside the zip and double click, "Clicker Tycoon.exe".

Warning: I recommend using auto click, because clicking too many times can cause RSI.

Have fun and thanks for the feedback!
